articles.title: The Charlie Javice Verdict: A Wake-Up Call For Fintechs And Banking - Forbes
articles.description: Javice’s conviction is sending shockwaves through fintech and banking. The case exposes vulnerabilities in fintech acquisitions. But the real hit is on trust in fintechs.
